We have a new name! ShopX is now Koinz.
New user interface.
Some cool hidden features.

- We have a new name! ShopX is now Koinz.
- New user interface.
- Some cool hidden features.
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Improved the sign-up.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Added a new method for account restoring.

Introducing our newest feature “Pick-up”, where you can order your favorite food from the app then pick it up from the restaurant/Cafe at your chosen time.
*Pick-up is currently available in limited areas.

Introducing our newest feature “Pick-up”, where you can order your favorite food from the app then pick it up from the restaurant/Cafe at your chosen time.

*Pick-up is currently available in limited areas.

Get more of what you love! We update Koinz app as often as possible to make it faster, more reliable and easier for you. In this release you will find the following:
- Revamped signup experience
- Revamped login experience

Love Koinz? Rate us now!
We are always ready to support you, Please send an email to support@koinz.app

Get more of what you love! We update Koinz app as often as possible to make it faster, more reliable and easier for you. In this release you will find the following:
- UI Improvements
- Bug Fixes

Love Koinz? Rate us now!
We are always ready to support you, Please send an email to support@koinz.app

- We updated the restaurant card in the ordering tab to make the merchant selection experience smoother.
- We changed the layout of the app
- We added more section where users can edit their profile, add addresses and access their inbox
- User can change language without logging out of the app
- For You tab is redesigned for a smoother experience
- Explore tab is redesigned to help users explore restaurants easier
- New filters are applied throughout the app, to make the filtration experience faster and easier

- We updated the restaurant card in the ordering tab to make the merchant selection experience smoother.
- We changed the layout of the app
- We added more section where users can edit their profile, add addresses and access their inbox
- User can change language without logging out of the app
- For You tab is redesigned for a smoother experience
- Explore tab is redesigned to help users explore restaurants easier
- New filters are applied throughout the app, to make the filtration experience faster and easier

- Revamped ordering experience: completely new Menu experience to make ordering your daily food joyful and more accessible - You will also notice new tracking screens when you place your favorite food to better capture your feedback and easily let you know what's the status of your order!
- Improved the promos capabilities to let you enjoy having discounts from your favorite restutants and cafes.
- Now you can add your address in few seconds using Google maps, move the location pin and easily update it via our world-class experience.
